content: patterns by julie may 18 2007 scrap bookmark my son 3 yrs old is helping me with the names for the bookmarks this bookmark is made from scrap or leftover yarn great for quick gifts *********** blue s clue bookmark 3 5mm hook scrap yarn stitches used chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet ch4 join in 1st chain to form a ring row 1 ch1 sc10 into ring slip_stitch in ch1 ch3 turn row 2 double_crochet into ch3 space twice ch2 dc3 in next single_crochet space ch3 turn row 3 *dc3 times into ch2 space repeat * once dc1 in 3rd double_crochet from hook ch3 turn row 4-6* repeat row 3 until you get the desired lenght fasten_off you can add a tassel to either end of the bookmark in the 2ch space or in the ring ************ © julie-ann kawano patterns by julie
